titles.title: 560 Still Still With Thee (easy, nice, word fit no

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Still still with Thee
When purple morning breaketh
When the bird waketh
And the shadows flee
Fairer than morning
Lovelier than the daylight
Dawns the sweet consciousness
I am with Thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As in the dawning
O'-er the waveless ocean
The image of
The morning star doth rest
So in this stillness
Thou beholdest only
Thine image in
the waters of my breast

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When sinks the soul
Subdued by toil to slumber
Its closing eye
looks up to Thee in prayer
Sweet the repose
Beneath thy wings o'ershadowing
But sweeter still to wake
And find Thee there

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
So shall it be
At last In that bright morning
When the soul waketh
And life's shadows flee
Oh in that hour
Fairer than daylight's dawning
Shall rise the glorious thought
I am with Thee
